dialogue.content: I'm trying to cut down on smoking.
What situations make it hardest-stress, social settings, or routines?
Got it. Are you aiming to quit entirely or reduce first?
Reduce first. I don't want an all-or-nothing plan.
Okay. Do you want behavioral swaps or tracking to start?
Behavioral swaps. Tracking makes me obsess.
Understood. We'll build small replacements around your triggers.
If I could handle stress and after-meal cravings without lighting up, I'd be proud of myself.
